  • Recruitment

We are always recruiting Ph.D. and Master students with strong academic background and solid programming skills. Students who have experiences related to the research topics in our lab are highly preferred.

If you are interested, please send an email to jcstem.hku@gmail.com. Note that your email title should be formatted as “Affiliation_Name_Program”. For example, if your name is Nemo and you are a student from HKU who intends to apply for the Ph.D. program, then your email title should be “HKU_Nemo_Ph.D.”.
